products.name: Ashlynn D' Elyse, the Queen's Blade & Companions

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Llael]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Llael non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: If this model is included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Hero of the People
characterabilities.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during its unit's activation, other friendly warrior models gain +2 to their accuracy rolls while in this model's CMD range. Hero of the People lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Tactician [Llael]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, friendly Llael models can ignore other friendly Llael models when determining LOS. Friendly Llael models can advance through other friendly Llael models in this model's CMD range if they have enough movement to move completely past them.

feat.name: Battle Cry
feat.description: Return up to three friendly destroyed Faction solos with point cost 6 or less each to play. Place those odels in base contact with this model. They must forfeit their Normal Movement or Combat Action the turn they are put into play. Models that were destroyed this turn cannot be returned to play as a result of Battle Cry. Additionally, while in Ashlynn's Control range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Dying Breath. Battle Cry lasts for one round. (When a model with Dying Breath is boxed by an enemy attack at any time except while it is advancing, it can immediately make one basic attack.)

execution.name: Unwaivering
execution.description: This model cannot be pushed, become knocked down, become stationary, be moved by a slam, and never suffers Blind or Shadow Bind.

ability.name: Thresher (★Attack)
ability.description: This model makes one melee attack with this weapon against each model in it's LOS that is in this weapon's melee range. Thresher attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Artifice of Deviation
spells.description: Place a 5' cloud effect template anywhere completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While in the AOE, friendly Faction models gain cover. Enemy models treat the template as rough terrain.

spells.name: Blood of Liberty
spells.description: While in this model's Control range, friendly living Llaelese models gain Tough and Unyielding. Blood of Liberty lasts for one round. (A mode with Unyielding gains +2 ARM against melee damage rolls.)

spells.name: Hand of Fate
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains an additional die on attack and damage rolls. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

spells.name: Perdition
spells.description: When an enemy model is damaged by Perdition, immediately after the attack is resolved one warjack in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is currently in it's Control range can make a full advance toward the nearest enemy model. A model can advance as a result of perdition only once per turn.

spells.name: True Path
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models/units beginning their activations in this Control Range gains +2" movement when advancing as part of their Normal Movement and Pathfinder during their activations. True Path lasts for one turn.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Ashlynn D' Elyse, The Queen's Blade]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Ashlynn D' Elyse, The Queen's Blade and is the same faction as Ashlynn D' Elyse, The Queen's Blade. If Ashlynn D' Elyse, The Queen's Blade is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Ashlynn D' Elyse, The Queen's Blade's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Duelist
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF against melee accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Provost Marshal [Reposition [3"]]
characterabilities.description: While this model is alive, and not under enemy control, models in this model's battlegroup gain Reposition [3"]. (At the end of an activation in which it did not run or fail a charge, a model with Reposition 3" can advance up to 3", then it's activation ends.)

ability.name: Both Barrels (★Attack)
ability.description: This model gains +4 to the damage roll for this attack. This model cannot make additional ranged attacks with this weapon during an activation in which it makes a Both Barrels Attack.

topability.name: Attack Type
topability.description: Each time this weapon is used to make an attack, choose one of the following special rules:

subabilities.name: Black Penny
subabilities.description: This attack ignores the target in melee DEF bonus.

subabilities.name: Thunderbolt
subabilities.description: Enemy models hit are pushed d3" directly away from the attacking model. On a critical hit, the enemy model becomes knocked down after being pushed.

subabilities.name: Trick Shot
subabilities.description: If this attack directly hits, choose another model within 4" of the model hit. The chosen model suffers an unboostable POW 10 Arcane damage roll. The point of origin for this damage is the model hit. Trick Shot damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack.

characterabilities.name: Companion [Ashlynn D'Elyse, The Queens's Blade]
characterabilities.description: This model is included in any army that includes Ashlynn D'Elyse, The Queens's Blade and is the same faction as Ashlynn D'Elyse, The Queens's Blade. If Ashlynn D'Elyse, The Queens's Blade is destroyed or removed from play, remove this model from play. This model is part of Ashlynn D'Elyse, The Queens's Blade's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Duelist
characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF against melee accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.name: Provost Marshal [Riposte]
characterabilities.description: While this model is alive, and not under enemy control, models in this model's battlegroup gain Riposte. (When a model with Riposte is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one basic melee attack against the attacking model.)

ability.name: Lunge
ability.description: This weapon becomes RNG 2 during this model's activation.

ability.name: Trip Up
ability.description: When this attack hits an enemy model with steady, that model loses steady and cannot regain steady for one round. When this attack hits an enemy model without steady, that model becomes knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Llael]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Llael non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.description: This model gains +2 DEF against melee accuracy rolls.

characterabilities.description: If this model is included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Reversal
characterabilities.description: When a model misses this model with a charge or power attack, the attacking model becomes knocked down.

characterabilities.name: Riposte
characterabilities.description: When this model is missed by an enemy melee attack, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one basic melee attack against the attacking model.

characterabilities.name: Veteran Leader [Llael]
characterabilities.description: While in this model's CMD range, Llael models gain +1 to attack accuracy rolls.

feat.name: Roulette
feat.description: While in Ashlynn's Control range, models gain two additional dice on their accuracy rolls. For each of those Accuracy rolls, you choose two of the dice rolled to be discarded, Roulette lasts for one round.

execution.name: Parry
execution.description: Once per round during your opponent's turn, when an enemy model within this model's LOS targets it with a melee attack, this model can make a melee attack against the enemy model before it makes it's attack accuracy roll. If this model's melee attack hits, the enemy model suffers no damage but it's attack automatically misses.

spells.name: Admonition
spells.description: When an enemy model advances and ends its movement or is warped within 6" of target model in this spellcaster's battlegroup, the affected model can immediately advance up to 3", then Admonition expires.

spells.name: Chosen Ground
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control range, models in its battlegroup gain Pathfinder and Steady. (A model with Steady cannot be knocked down.)

spells.name: Distraction
spells.description: Target warrior model/unit cannot make ranged attacks and suffer -2 DEF and MAT for one round.

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Gallows
spells.description: When an enemy model is hit by this attack, it can be pushed d6" directly toward Gallows' point of origin.

spells.name: Quicken
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +2 SPD and DEF against ranged and magic attack rolls.

characterabilities.name: Acrobatics
characterabilities.description: This model can advance through other models if it has enough movement to move completely past their bases. This model ignores intervening models when declaring its charge target.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Cygnar non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Dodge
characterabilities.description: This model can advance up to 2" immediately after an enemy attack that missed it is resolved unless it was missed while advancing. It cannot be targeted by free strikes during this movement.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: If this model is included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Sprint
characterabilities.description: At the end of an activation in which it destroyed or removed from play one or more enemy models with melee attacks, this model can immediately make a full advance, then it's activation ends.

feat.name: Powerhouse
feat.description: While in Jakes' Control range, friendly Faction warjacks gains +2 to melee accuracy and melee damage rolls. While within 3" of the affected warjack, friendly Faction non-warjack models gain +2 on melee accuracy and melee damage rolls. Powerhouse lasts for one turn.

execution.name: Medallion of Ascendant Rowan
execution.description: The first time each turn this model would be the target of an enemy spell or upkeep, increase the cost of that spell or upkeep by 1.

ability.name: Reload [1]
ability.description: This model can spend up to 1 focus, fury, or essence to make one additional ranged attack with this weapon during its Combat Action per focus, fury, or essence spent.

ability.name: Feedback
ability.description: If this weapon damages a warjack that is part of a battlegroup, the warjack's controller suffers 1 damage point.

ability.name: Electro Leap
ability.description: When a model is hit by a basic attack made with this weapon, you can have lightning arc to the nearest model within 4" of the model hit, ignoring the attacking model and any model with Resistance: Electric. The model the lightning arcs to suffers an unboostable POW 10 Electric damage roll. Lightning arc damage rolls are not considered to have been caused by an attack. Resolve lightning arc damage rolls simultaneously with the damage resulting from the attack that caused the leap.

spells.name: Bulwark
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, and B2B with one or more models in its battlegroup, models in the spellcaster's battlegroup gain +2 DEF and cannot become knocked down.

spells.name: Dash
spells.description: The spellcaster and friendly Faction warrior models activating in its Control Range gain +1 SPD. While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly Faction warrior models gain Unstoppable. Dash lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Electrical Blast
spells.description: Electrical Blast causes electrical damage. Warjacks damaged by Electrical Blast suffer Disruption.

spells.name: Lightning Tendrils
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Resistance: Electricity. Affected models' melee weapons become RNG 2 and gain Electro Leap. Models are not affected while out of formation.

characterabilities.description: This model can include Cygnar non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.description: If this model is included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

feat.name: Invincibility
feat.description: While in Commander Coleman Stryker's Control range, friendly Faction models gain +5 ARM for one round.

execution.name: Resourceful
execution.description: This model can upkeep spells on models in it's battlegroup without spending focus or fury.

spells.name: Arcane Blast
spells.description: A magical energy blast radiates from a single point to strike all models in the AOE.

spells.name: Arcane Bolt
spells.description: Magical bolts of energy streak toward the target model.

spells.name: Arcane Shield
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 ARM. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Blur
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains +3 DEF against ranged and magic attack rolls. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Earthquake
spells.description: Models hit by Earthquake become knocked down.

spells.name: Snipe
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model's/unit's non spray ranged weapons gain +4 RNG.

products.name: Constance Blaize, Knight of the Prophet

characterabilities.name: Blessing of Morrow
characterabilities.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range during their activations, friendly non-Leader Morrowan warrior models can spend focus on this model to boost one melee accuracy or one melee damage for each focus point spent.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Mercenaries]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Mercenaries non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: If this model is included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Flank [Morrowan]
characterabilities.description: When this model makes a melee attack against an enemy model in the melee range of a friendly Morrowan model, this model gains +2 to attack rolls and gains an additional damage die.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Llael, Ord]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Llael, Ord.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Religion of the Twins, Cygnar]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Religion of the Twins, Cygnar armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Soul Protector [CTRL]
characterabilities.description: This model can collect soul tokens from friendly models that are destroyed within this model's Control range. After this model replenishes focus during your next Control Phase, replace each soul token with 1 focus/fury/essence point.

characterabilities.name: Soul Taker [Unlimited Tokens]
characterabilities.description: This model can gain soul tokens. There is no limit to how many soul tokens it can carry.

feat.name: Divine Intervention
feat.description: While in Blaize's Control range, friendly living Faction warrior models gain +1 ARM for each soul token on Blaize. Additionally, while in Blaize's Control range, Morrowan models gain Divine Inspiration. Divine Intervention lasts for one round. (A model with Divine Inspiration gains an additional die on melee accuracy and melee damage rolls. Discard the lowest die of each roll.)

execution.name: Set Defense
execution.description: A model in this model's front arc suffers -2 on charge, slam power attack, and impact attack accuracy rolls against this model.

spells.name: Crusader's Call
spells.description: Friendly Faction models beginning a charge in the spell caster's Control Range gain +2" movement. Crusader's Call lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Flashing Blade
spells.description: The spellcaster immediately makes one basic attack with one of its melee weapons against each enemy model in its LOS that is in the weapon's melee range. These attacks are simultaneous.

spells.name: Fortune
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit can reroll its missed attack rolls. Each attack roll can be rerolled only once as a result of Fortune.

spells.name: Repudiate
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Repudiate immediately expires. When an upkeep spell expires as a result of Repudiate, the model maintaining the spell suffers d3 damage points.

spells.name: Sunburst
spells.description: Sunburst blast damage affects only enemy models. Models boxed by Sunburst are removed from play.

characterabilities.name: Caster Adept [Mercenaries]
characterabilities.description: This model can include Mercenaries non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Cultists
characterabilities.description: Choose one friendly living non-Morrowan Faction unit at the beginning of the game to be Cultists. Cultists are Thamarite models. This model can upkeep one spell without spending focus if there is one or more Cultist models in formation in its Control range during the Control Phase. Additionally, Cultist models do not suffer damage when spells are channeled through them as a result of Dark Rituals.

characterabilities.name: Dark Rituals
characterabilities.description: This model can channel spells through friendly Faction warrior models in its Control Range. Immediately after a spell is channeled through a model as a result of Dark Rituals, the model it was channeled through suffers d3 points of Arcane damage.

characterabilities.name: Flames in the Darkness
characterabilities.description: If this model is included in a Religion of the Twins army, you may include up to 2 Cygnar or Khador Non-Character warjacks in this model's battlegroup.

characterabilities.name: Mercenary [Cryx, Cygnar, Khador, Ord, Talion Charter]
characterabilities.description: This model will work for Cryx, Cygnar, Khador, Ord, Talion Charter.

characterabilities.name: Partisan [Talion Charter, Religion of the Twins]
characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Talion Charter, Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Whiplash
characterabilities.description: When an enemy model misses this model with a magic attack, the attacking model becomes the target and is automatically hit by the attack. AOE magic attacks that miss are centered on the attacking model. This model is the point of origin for all these attacks.

feat.name: Dark Omens
feat.description: Enemy models roll one fewer die when making accuracy and damage rolls while in Fiona's Control range. Dark Omen lasts for one round.

execution.name: Great Power
execution.description: During your Control Phase, this model can upkeep one spell without spending focus, fury or essence.

ability.name: Grievous Wounds
ability.description: A model hit by this weapon loses Tough and cannot have damage removed from it for one round.

spells.name: Befuddle
spells.description: On a hit, you can immediately advance target enemy non-Leader model up to 3”. A model can move only once as a result of befuddle.

spells.name: Chasten
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on target model/unit damaged by this attack expire.

spells.name: Curse of Veils
spells.description: Target model/unit suffers -2 ARM and does not block LOS.

spells.name: Occultation
spells.description: Target friendly Faction Model/Unit gains Stealth. Models are not affected while out of formation.

spells.name: Roth's Mercy
spells.description: When an enemy attack disables a living model in the target friendly Faction unit, you can choose a non-disabled living model in the unit to be destroyed. If another model is destroyed as a result of Roth's Mercy, the disabled model removes 1 damage point.

spells.name: Soulfire
spells.description: When a living, non-soulless enemy model is boxed by Soulfire, the spellcaster gains 1 focus, fury or essence point and the boxed model is removed from play. If the spellcaster does not have a special rule that allows it to gain focus, fury or essence points, it cannot gain a focus, fury or essence point as a result of Soulfire.

characterabilities.name: Sacred Ward
characterabilities.description: This model cannot be targeted by enemy spells.

feat.name: Howling Wind
feat.description: While in Zerkova's Control range, enemy models cannot make ranged attacks. Enemy models beginning their activations in Zerkova's Control range cannot run, charge, make power attacks or special attacks, give or receive orders, or make special actions. Howling Wind lasts for one round.

execution.name: Gate Walker
execution.description: Once per activation, immediately after this model casts a spell, you can warp this model anywhere completely within 5" of its current location.

topability.name: Arcane Artifacts
topability.description: When this model casts a spell, you can choose to use one of the following special rules. Each special rule can be used only once per activation and expires after the spell is cast.

subabilities.name: Focus Sphere
subabilities.description: Reduce the COST of the spell by 1.

subabilities.name: Lens of Tarvodh
subabilities.description: The spell gains +5 RNG.

subabilities.name: Medallion of Ekris
subabilities.description: When determining LOS, the spellcaster gains True Sight. (This model ignores cloud effects when determining LOS. This model also ignores Stealth.)

ability.name: Grave Door
ability.description: A model disabled by this weapon cannot make a Tough roll. When a living or undead enemy model is boxed by this attack, you can choose to take Control of it. If you do, remove 1 damage point from it, causing it to no longer be boxed. You can then immediately change it's facing. For the rest of the turn, this model can channel spells through the affected model while it is in this model's Control Range. This model can channel spells even while engaged. The affected model cannot activate. At the end of the turn, the affected model is destroyed.

ability.name: Silence
ability.description: A model hit by this attack cannot cast spells for one round.

spells.name: Freezing Mist
spells.description: Place a 3" AOE cloud effect completely within the spellcaster's Control Range. While in the AOE, models without Resistance: Cold suffer -2 to their accuracy rolls. The AOE remains in play for one round.

spells.name: Frost Hammer
spells.description: Frost Hammer causes cold damage. On a critical hit the model hit becomes stationary for one round unless it has Resistance: Cold.

spells.name: Ghost Walk
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Ghostly for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes).

spells.name: Hex Blast
spells.description: Enemy upkeep spells and animi on the model/unit directly hit by Hex Blast immediately expire.

spells.name: Watcher
spells.description: Once per turn when an enemy model advances and ends its movement within 6" of the spellcaster, you can choose a Cohort model in the spellcaster's battlegroup that is in its Control Range. That Cohort model can immediately make a full advance toward the enemy model and then can make one basic attack targeting the enemy model.

characterabilities.description: This model can include Llael non-character Warjacks in its battlegroup regardless of any other army construction rules. If this model has a bonded Warjack, they may add it to their battlegroup.

characterabilities.description: This model possesses a cursed weapon that has the ability to collect souls. This model does not collect or keep soul tokens itself. Abilities that affect the collection of souls that only affect models, do not affect this model's weapon, unless the ability specifies affecting weapon attributes.

characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

characterabilities.name: Shadow of a Giant
characterabilities.description: This model gains an additional die on magic accuracy rolls against enemy models within 5" of a warjack in its battlegroup.

execution.name: Weapon Soul Reserve
execution.description: This model's weapon with Soul Taker begins the game with a soul token.

ability.name: Black Boon
ability.description: While this model's weapon has at least one soul token it gains an additional die on accuracy and damage rolls made when resolving an attack with this weapon. Discard the lowest die in each roll.

ability.name: Weapon Soul Taker [5 Tokens]
ability.description: This weapon can gain soul tokens. This weapon can carry up to 5 soul tokens at any time.

topability.name: Soul Reaver
topability.description: When this weapon destroys a living enemy model with an attack, it gains the destroyed model's soul token. This model can spend soul tokens from this weapon for the following:

subabilities.name: Dark Blessing
subabilities.description: Once per turn at any time during its activation, you may spend one token from this model's weapon, if you do, this model gains +3 DEF for one round.

subabilities.name: Death Dealer
subabilities.description: You can remove three soul tokens from thas model's weapon at the start of it's Combat Action to use Death Dealer. If you do, this weapon becomes ROF 4 and its accuracy and damage rolls are boosted during this model's Combat Action. This model cannot make additional attacks on this activation.

spells.name: Black Spot
spells.description: Target enemy warrior model/unit suffers -2 DEF. When a friendly Faction model destroys one or more affected models with a basic melee or ranged attack during its Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved it can make one additional melee or ranged attack. Attacks gained from Black Spot cannot generate additional attacks from Black Spot.

spells.name: Dauntless Resolve
spells.description: Target friendly Faction warrior model/unit gains +3 ARM and Tough.

spells.name: Fire Group
spells.description: While models in the spellcaster's battlegroup are in its Control Range, their ranged weapons gain +2 RNG. Fire Group lasts for one turn.

spells.name: Ghost Walk
spells.description: Target friendly Faction model/unit gains Ghostly for one turn. (A model with Ghostly can advance through terrain and obstacles without penalty and can advance through obstructions if it has enough movement to move completely past them. It cannot be targeted by free strikes).

spells.name: Lifebound
spells.description: Target friendly living model/unit gains Shield Guard. WHen an affected model is destroyed by an enemy attack, the spellcaster's weapon gains it's soul token. (When a friendly model is directly hit by a non-spray ranged attack during your opponent's turn while within 3" of a model with Shield Guard, you can choose to have the model with Shield Guard directly hit instead. It is automatically hit and suffers all damage and effects. A model can use Shield Guard only once per round and cannot use Shield Guard if it is incorporeal, knocked down, or stationary. The Shield Guard special rule can only trigger once per attack roll.)

characterabilities.description: Once per activation, you can roll one to three dice. This model gains a bonus to melee attacks equal to the total of that roll. Then roll the same dice again. This model suffers damage equal to the total of that roll. This model cannot spend a focus point to reduce this damage. This bonus expires at the end of the model's activation. (In execution mode, this model is able to take lethal damage from this ability.)

characterabilities.description: This model/unit may be included in Religion of the Twins armies and when included, this model/unit becomes a model of that faction and doesn't count as a model for other factions on its card.

feat.description: After all friendly models have completed their activation this turn, friendly Faction models/units currently in Lord Commander Stryker's Control range can advance up to 3" and the can make one basic melee attack. When resolving these attacks, affected models can spend focus points to boost one accuracy or damage roll for each focus spent.

execution.name: Quick Work
execution.description: When this model destroys one or more enemy models with a melee attack during it's Combat Action, immediately after the attack is resolved, it can make one basic ranged attack.

spells.name: Deceleration
spells.description: While in the spellcaster's Control Range, friendly faction models gain +2 ARM against ranged and magic attack damage rolls. Deceleration lasts for one round.

characterabilities.description: The lower level of this structure is considered to be concealing terrain.

characterabilities.name: Catastrophic Collapse
characterabilities.description: When this model is destroyed or removed from play, all models inside of it immediately suffer 10 damage. This damage is simultaneous and not considered to have resulted from an attack. Replace this model with all surviving models that were inside of it when it was destroyed.

characterabilities.name: Forward Deployment
characterabilities.description: This model can be deployed up to 8” beyond your deployment zone.

characterabilities.name: Habitable [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Small and medium-based units and solos can enter this structure through a door on the lower level. A model/unit ending its Normal Movement within 1” of the door can choose to enter this building. Models entering this building can be placed on either the lower or upper levels. Models in a unit occupying this structure can be placed on either floor or both. There can be up to six small-based models or three medium-based models on each floor. There must be room for a model's base for it to be placed on either floor.

characterabilities.name: Movement Inside [Bunker]
characterabilities.description: Models/units can use their Normal Movement to be placed on the top floor if they were previously on the lower floor or to be placed on the lower floor if they were on the top floor. Units using their Normal Movement to be placed are considered to have moved. Models cannot otherwise move, warp, or be placed while inside the building.
